title: Standings: Checking Standings section default
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the standings page
And have not visited the standings page before
custom_steps: When you go to the standings page
custom_expected: Then the 'Divisional' tab should be selected at the top and populated in the main section below

title: Standings: Checking Divisional page
custom_preconds: Given that you are on the standings page
custom_steps: When you tap on the Divisional tab at the top
custom_expected:
Then the Divisional tab should highlight
And the Divisional standings page should load in the main section below
And the American League should be above the National League
And the divisions should appear East, Central, West

title: Standings: Checking Wildcard page
custom_preconds: Given that you are on the standings section
custom_steps: When you tap on the Wild Card tab
custom_expected:
Then the Wild Card tab will be highlighted
And the Wild Card standings will load in the main section below
And the American League will be above the National League
And the standings will be split into Division Leaders and Wild Card

title: Standings: Checking records and information are correct
custom_preconds: Given you are on the standings section
custom_steps: When you go to the standings section
custom_expected: Then the information populated in the main section should be up to date and accurate

title: Standings: Returning the standings page after being backgrounded
custom_preconds: Given you are on the standings section
custom_steps:
When you go to the standings section pay attention to the records
And background the app
And wait for games to final
And wait a few minutes to let the final statistics propogate
And go back into the app
custom_expected: Then the records of on the standings page should update
